text.more:
The list of keywords related to social issues and values, manually extracted from NGI reports, was used as a seed. The network contains all articles linked from, and linked to, at least two of these keywords' articles.

The size of each node is proportional to its degree, i.e. to its overall number of connections within the network.

Each colour indicates a cluster of articles densely connected with each other.
text.intro: Network of hyperlinks between Wikipedia articles around NGI related social issues and values keywords.
text.title: NGI social issues and values network
